version_description: Bug Fixes

Bug Fixes
There is free pack of stickers specially designed for our Dick’s Sporting Goods athletes. Bring your message to life by adding fist bump, slam dunk, on fire, winning etc. with our stickers! Easy to share with your friends on chat via iMessage.
Bug Fixes

Bug Fixes
There is free pack of stickers specially designed for our Dick’s Sporting Goods athletes. Bring your message to life by adding fist bump, slam dunk, on fire, winning etc. with our stickers! Easy to share with your friends on chat via iMessage.

What’s new:
Now you can track your order in the app!
We improved navigation by adding the hamburger menu on all screens so you can get to what you need faster
Know when you have rewards available right on the home screen
Ever forget your username and password? Select “Remember Me” on the login page to save your credentials and login faster

Bug fixes for performance improvement.

What’s new:
Now you can track your order in the app!
We improved navigation by adding the hamburger menu on all screens so you can get to what you need faster
Know when you have rewards available right on the home screen
Ever forget your username and password? Select “Remember Me” on the login page to save your credentials and login faster

Bug fixes for performance improvement.

What’s new:

MOVE just got better! A new goal has been added to earn ScoreCard loyalty points daily. You can now earn 3 points daily by completing 30 minutes of activity. Also, all of your connected trackers will now be active. The tracker that achieves a goal first will be used to award loyalty points.

Highlights of app features are included at launch of the app.

Thank-you for using the DICK'S mobile app! We are always making changes and improvements to enhance your experience.

Updates:
⁃ My Store - New! Save your favorite DICK'S Sporting Goods retail location as well as easier access to your store's directions, phone number, services, and weekly ad
⁃ Updated FAQs
⁃ Performance improvements to MOVE
- Bug fixing and application stability improvement

Thank you for using the DICK’S Sporting Goods Mobile App! We’ve made improvements to your experience:
- You now have an improved sign in so you can use your DicksSportingGoods.com or GolfGalaxy.com credentials for the App.
- Bug fixes and general experience improvements for your inbox and notifications.

In this version, we’ve introduced the ability for you to check in for your Curbside Contactless Pickup order. You can let us know you’re on your way to the store, and we’ll alert you when you arrive to continue your check in process!

Thank you for using the DICK’S mobile app!

In this version, we’ve introduced the ability for you to check in for your Curbside Contactless Pickup order. You can let us know you’re on your way to the store, and we’ll alert you when you arrive to continue your check in process!

Thank you for using the DICK’S mobile app!

In this version, we've redesigned the entire Account section, making it easier and more efficient to update your preferences, redeem rewards and access your inbox. We've also fixed a few bugs and improved performance.
